current_activities.S: Crude oil & petroleum, liquid bulk, containers, general cargo, petrochemicals, export/import operations, heavy equipment, bulk raw materials, refinery supplies.

description.S: The  is the busiest U.S. port by foreign waterborne tonnage, serving as a major gateway for crude oil, LNG, petrochemicals, and containerized cargo on the Gulf Coast. It supports a wide network of terminals and significant domestic and international trade.

major_business.S: Crude oil, LNG, petrochemicals, containerized goods, bulk commodities, heavy machinery.

current_activities.S: Bulk petrochemicals, crude oil, grain exports, liquid bulk, heavy cargo transit, river-gulf transshipment.

description.S: The  spans a long stretch along the Mississippi River and functions as a critical hub for bulk exports and imports — especially crude oil, petroleum products, grain and other bulk commodities for both domestic and foreign markets.

major_business.S: Crude oil, grains, bulk commodities, petrochemicals.

current_activities.S: LNG, crude oil, petroleum, bulk liquids, general cargo, container shipments, energy exports.

description.S: The  is a major energy gateway on the Gulf Coast — handling crude oil, LNG and bulk liquid commodities, as well as serving general cargo and container traffic, supporting America’s energy export infrastructure.

major_business.S: Crude oil, LNG, bulk liquids, export cargo.

current_activities.S: Containers, vehicles, bulk cargo, general imports/exports, container terminals, trans-shipment.

description.S: The  is the largest port complex on the U.S. East Coast and a top container gateway, handling a diverse mix of containerized cargo, vehicles, consumer goods, and bulk cargo for international and domestic markets.

name.S: Port of New York and New Jersey

current_activities.S: Bulk cargo, container traffic, liquid bulk, imports/exports, river-sea transshipment.

description.S: The  serves as a historic and strategic gateway along the Gulf Coast — handling bulk cargo, containers, liquid bulk, and river-sea transshipment, connecting inland waterways with global shipping lanes.

major_business.S: Bulk cargo, containers, liquid bulk, imports/exports.

current_activities.S: Container shipping, vehicle shipments, bulk cargo, imports & exports, trans-Pacific trade.

description.S: The  is a major West Coast container port — a key gateway for US-Asia trade, handling millions of containers annually and supporting diversified cargo including vehicles, bulk goods and consumer products. It neighbours the Port of Los Angeles.

major_business.S: Containerized goods, vehicles, consumer goods, imports/exports.

current_activities.S: Container shipping, international cargo, general cargo, trans-Pacific trade, vehicle containers, bulk cargo.

description.S: The  — often called “America’s Port” — is the busiest container port in the United States, a major gateway for imports from Asia, and home to extensive container terminals, bulk cargo docks and vehicle handling facilities.

current_activities.S: Bulk cargo, petrochemicals, river-gulf transshipment, general imports/exports.

description.S: The  serves the inland and Gulf region via the Mississippi River — dealing with bulk commodities, petrochemicals, and general cargo, providing a link between river traffic and sea shipping lanes.
